Subskills.name: Leech Swarm
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of leeches spawned.

Subskills.name: Power Sucktion
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by jar of leeches.

Subskills.name: Jug Juggler
Subskills.description: Throw multiple jars in an arc dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Nimble Creepers
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of jar of leeches.

Subskills.name: Draining the Demons
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt to bosses.

Subskills.name: Bloody Surprise
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional jar of leeches.

Subskills.name: Overfed
Subskills.description: Increases area of effect radius of jar of leeches.

Subskills.name: Jar Handler
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum cast range of jar of leeches.

Subskills.name: Lasting Hunger
Subskills.description: Leeches now stick on targets for a short duration dealing increased damage over time.

Subskills.name: Leaking Dents
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Call to Ascend
Subskills.description: Consume nearby corpses adding additional leeches into the jar.

Subskills.name: Blood Sharing
Subskills.description: Restore a portion of your maximum life on hit.

Subskills.name: Blood-infused Leeches
Subskills.description: Increases leech damage, size and area of effect radius based on your vitality. Jar of leeches consumes a portion of your maximum life per cast.

Subskills.name: Toxicophile Bloodsucker
Subskills.description: Spawn a static leech at target location. The leech pulsates dealing damage and slowly pulling monsters towards it on hit. Jar of leeches now has a cooldown.
